original_title: The SpinMeister, For a Perfect Pizza Every Time!
original_content:
If you dont happen to have a traditional stone-floored domed clay oven on hand, it can be surprisingly challenging to make a pizza thats truly excellent. Your domestic oven does a reasonable job, but doesnt really get hot enough. Even a specialist pizza oven such as [Yvo de Haas] Ooni doesnt quite do the best possible, so hes upgraded it with the SpinMeister  a system for precise timing of the heat, and controlled rotation of the cooking stone for an even result.
The spinning part is handled by a stepper motor, driving a hex shaft attached to the bottom of the stone through a chuck. The rotating bearing itself is from an aftermarket stone rotator kit. The controller meanwhile is a smart 3D printed unit with a vacuum-fluorescent display module, powered from an Arduino Nano. Theres a motor controller to handle driving the stepper, and an MP3 module for audible warning. Its all powered from a USB-C powerbank, for true portability. Hes produced a video showing it cooking a rather tasty-looking flatbread, which weve placed below. Now for some unaccountable reason, we want pizza.
If you recognize [Yvo]s name, then perhaps its because hes appeared on these pages a few times. Whether its a tentacle robot or something genuinely different in 3D printing, his work never ceases to be interesting.
title: 石焼きピザを改善！ホームメイドピザオーブンのスピンシステム
body: 自宅のオーブンでピザを作るのは難しいが、[Yvo de Haas]がOoniピザオーブンを改良。コントローラーとステッピングモーターを追加、回転石を制御。アルドゥイーノNanoから給電。USB-C充電池で電源供給。[Yvo]は他にも興味深い作品を制作。
